entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
